Package com.zmicierk.webcrawler

Class WebCrawler

java.lang.Object
com.zmicierk.webcrawler.WebCrawler
public class WebCrawler
extends java.lang.Object
The class is the main class of the application. The "main" method of this class is the entry point into the program. The tasks of this class are as follows: Recognition of input command line arguments and checking their correctness. Initializing the WebCrawlerThread class. Starting the craving process (calling the start method of the WebCrawlerThread class).

    The maximum number of pages to visit.
    static int numToPrintInTopFile
    The number of records in the file specified in the topFileName parameter.
    static boolean printHeader
    Determines whether to display the table heading in output files.
    static java.lang.String rawFileName
    The path to the CSV file in which all statistical data will be serialized (without predefined sorting)
    static java.lang.String startUrl
    URL from which the process starts its work.(seed)
    static java.lang.String termString
    A term string to define the number of occurrences per page.
    static int timeOut
    Time to wait for a response from the server.
    static int timeOutJS
    The maximum amount of time to wait (in milliseconds) Used in waitForBackgroundJavaScript This method blocks until all background JavaScript tasks have finished executing.
    static int timeOutJSBefore
    The delay which determines the background tasks to wait for (in milliseconds) Used in waitForBackgroundJavaScriptStartingBefore This method blocks until all background JavaScript tasks scheduled to start executing before (now + timeOutJSBefore) have finished executing.
    static java.lang.String topFileName
    The path to the CSV file in which top by total hits statistical data will be serialized (sorted by total hits).

  • Field Details

    • maxVisited

      public static int maxVisited
      The maximum number of pages to visit.

    • maxDepth

      public static int maxDepth
      The maximum number of transitions in depth relative to the initial page.

    • enableJS

      public static boolean enableJS
      Enables/disables JavaScript support. If true JS enabled, else disabled.

    • timeOut

      public static int timeOut
      Time to wait for a response from the server.

    • timeOutJSBefore

      public static int timeOutJSBefore
      The delay which determines the background tasks to wait for (in milliseconds) Used in waitForBackgroundJavaScriptStartingBefore This method blocks until all background JavaScript tasks scheduled to start executing before (now + timeOutJSBefore) have finished executing.

    • timeOutJS

      public static int timeOutJS
      The maximum amount of time to wait (in milliseconds) Used in waitForBackgroundJavaScript This method blocks until all background JavaScript tasks have finished executing.

    • numToPrintInTopFile

      public static int numToPrintInTopFile
      The number of records in the file specified in the topFileName parameter.

    • topFileName

      public static java.lang.String topFileName
      The path to the CSV file in which top by total hits statistical data will be serialized (sorted by total hits). The number of entries in this file is specified in the numToPrintInTopFile parameter.

    • rawFileName

      public static java.lang.String rawFileName
      The path to the CSV file in which all statistical data will be serialized (without predefined sorting)

    • startUrl

      public static java.lang.String startUrl
      URL from which the process starts its work.(seed)

    • termString

      public static java.lang.String termString
      A term string to define the number of occurrences per page. Terms are separated by commas.

    • arOfTerms

      public static java.lang.String[] arOfTerms
      An array of term strings to determine the number of occurrences per page.

    • printHeader

      public static boolean printHeader
      Determines whether to display the table heading in output files. true - display the table header false - do not display the table header

    • caseSensitive

      public static boolean caseSensitive
      If true, the search will be case sensitive.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method is the entry point to the program. Accepts command line arguments. Calls the method of their recognition, initializes WebCrawlerThread, starts the crawling process.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments passed to the application at startup

    • encodeArgument

      public static void encodeArgument​(java.lang.String[] args)
      The method decodes the input string and sets the values of the class fields in accordance with the decoding result.
      Parameters:
      args - Input string to decode.

      public static void printHelpToStandardOutput()
      Used to display help information about the application.
